name: Among Us Discord Bot
description: This bot mutes discord users according to what happens in Among Us. It gets data from the game by the packets sent to/received from the server.

BOT_SERVER_URL.description: The base url of the web server the bot creates. Should be https://app-name.herokuapp.com/ (replace the "app-name" with your app's name

ROOM_CREATION_VOICE_ID.description: Users must be connected to this voice channel to create a room (blank for any voice)

GENERAL_VOICE_ID.description: Will move the users to here before closing the room (blank for don't move)

ROOM_CATEGORY_ID.description: Where voice channels for rooms will be created

ROOM_CREATION_ROLE.description: The role to tag when a room is created (Takes a role id, blank for don't tag)

BOT_SERVER_PORT.description: The port the web server will use. Leave this blank
